name: Outdoor Research X-Gaiters - Unisex
description: Add a layer of warmth and protection to your feet on high mountain ascents and descents. The X-Gaiters are insulated with Primaloft® Aerogel, an incredibly warm material used to insulate space suits, for maximum warmth in extreme environments. The grippy neoprene rand and undertoe cap provide a bombproof seal against snow.Front panels are abrasion-resistant 70-denier nylon, polyester and spandex for durability.Back panel is insulating 3mm neoprene.2mm Primaloft® Gold Aerogel insulation covers toes and lower boot.Hook-and-loop closure and top strap for a tight seal and easy on and off.Silicone-covered neoprene rand seals tightly around boots.Hypalon toe cap and underfoot shockcord hold gaiters securely in place.
